message: Wrong lexicographical order for 'javax.annotation.Nullable' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.arena.Arena'.
Wrong lexicographical order for 'java.lang.reflect.InvocationTargetException' import. Should be before 'plugily.projects.murdermystery.arena.Arena'.
WhitespaceAround: 'if' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
'loc' has incorrect indentation level 8, expected level should be 10.
WhitespaceAround: 'catch' is not followed by whitespace. Empty blocks may only be represented as {} when not part of a multi-block statement (4.1.3)
